title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.2 - Licensing, registration and equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.2 - Licensing, registration and equipment

State Regulations

No person shall operate a motor vehicle in or upon any part
of a vehicular crossing unless he is duly authorized to operate motor vehicles
in the State of New York, and no motor vehicle which is not registered or is
not properly equipped for operation upon the public highways of the State in
accordance with the provisions of the law of the State of New York shall be
permitted in or upon any part of a vehicular crossing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1023.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
